title: Hands-on: Withings BPM Connect portable blood pressure monitor with Apple Health support
content:
May is Blood Pressure Education Month with May 17 serving as World Hypertension Day to raise awareness and help detect, prevent, and control the health issue. This month we’ve been trying out the most portable blood pressure monitor medically cleared by the FDA, the . Read along for a detailed look at this blood pressure monitor with Apple Health integration plus how far Withings has come in recent years.

more…

The post Hands-on: Withings BPM Connect portable blood pressure monitor with Apple Health support appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: This detailed review covers the Withings BPM Connect portable blood pressure monitor with Apple Health support.
